plot: The two brothers return bigger and better than ever for this sequel to the "Army of Brothers" film. This time it's kill or be killed as they fight back against the evil REF soldiers and as they seek the truth.
title: Army of Brothers 2: There Will Be Blood
plot_es: The two brothers return bigger and better than ever for this sequel to the "Army of Brothers" film. This time it's kill or be killed as they fight back against the evil REF soldiers and as they seek the truth.
original_name: Army of Brothers 2: There Will Be Blood
